name: Death Metal Retro Shooter
description:
Game made during the Mini Jam 23

Theme was : TIME

You need to survive !

Shoot enemies and don't die !

Move : WASD 

Space : Jump

Shoot : Left Click

Slow down time : Right Click

R : Reload

Alt + F4 : Quit Game

Art : Hugues Laborde

Programming : Valentin Gras
